dmca.title: [ABUSE] abuse of information and copywrite infringement
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page
<http://www.tonysmovies.com/video/torture.shtml>
http://www.tonysmovies.com/video/torture.shtml any of the material that you
claim is being infringed as of 4:45:32 p.m. (GMT-6).

 

Legal Response Team

ThePlanet.com 


  _____  

From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Lani Beck
Sent: Thursday, January 26, 2006 9:48 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ABUSE] abuse of information and copywrite infringement


To whom it may concern.  
 
A web site you are hosting at URL:
http://www.tonysmovies.com/video/torture.shtml is using my information and a
link to my copywrited photographic image on their porn website.  I would
like this copywrite infringement dealt with and my personal information
removed from this website.  The image representing "ladynoelani76" is myself
and I have given no permission for this site to use my information or link a
false image to my true, copywrited image.
 
 This individual is violating his TOS with ThePlanet.com by violating
copywrited photographs, cross posting and internet slander.  
 
I require a response to my letter in three days or I will contact legal
council with this situation.  You may also contact me via telephone at 815
272 0454

Miss. Michelle Becker


  _____  

Do you Yahoo!?
With a free 1 GB, there's more in store with Yahoo!
<http://us.rd.yahoo.com/mail_us/taglines/mailstorage/*http://mail.yahoo.com/
> Mail.
